summary: Provides a set of deprecated utilities for wrapping arbitrary Python objects in a generic, encoded container and converting them to and from various serialized formats (JSON, pickle, text, etc.) to enable safe storage or transport of Prefect data such as task results.
business_intent: Facilitates backwardâ€‘compatible persistence and retrieval of Prefect workflow data by encoding objects, selecting appropriate serializers, and handling their lifecycle, while guiding users toward newer mechanisms.
